instructions: Make a readable black-and-white photocopy of a valid official membership card or Veteran's Administration Identification Card. To help us verify your age, follow these easy steps: copy your official identification and your completed and signed Age Verification Form. Send the form in the postage-paid envelope.
deadline: Your completed Age Verification Form must reach us by 3/31/9.
offer_restriction: Offer restricted to individuals 18 years of age or older.
requirements: Your signature and birthdate are required to determine your eligibility.
